page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our area of study for the Domesday Survey has proved interesting because of its variety. Most of it consists of market gardening land,glass houses and polythene tunnels,together with evidence of locally grown produce seen in the form of stalls lining the A44 Broadway-Evesham road. One square is made up of the newer residential area of Evesham, with the new Presto Supermarket, The High School, Simon de Montfort Middle School and The Vale Special School. We looked at the complete village of Wickhamford,with its Church and Manor.The various activities available in the village have proved interesting as has the work of the National Canine Defence League Kennels. Our survey also covered the southern part of Badsey, fortunately including our school,{Badsey First School.}
